article_title: Good And Bad News About The ACA Penalty Tax

article_metadata.author: Business in the Beltway

og.description: An important feature of the Affordable Care Act (ACA) is the penalty tax imposed on people who do not have health insurance. But newly updated report from the Congressional Budget Office projects that just under 4 million people will pay the penalty in 2016, less than 15 percent of the estimated 30 [...]
